hotels.title: Edinburgh Heritage Escape with Brasserie-Style Restaurant
hotels.description: The charms of yesteryear perfectly harmonise with modern facilities and contemporary luxuries at The InterContinental Edinburgh The George, a hotel that has been welcoming guests through its doors since 1881. After wandering the cobbled streets of the Royal Mile, return to this stunning Georgian-style palace and head to The Printing Press Bar & Kitchen for a meal and a single malt whisky, or sip flutes of bubbly at Taittinger Champagne Bar for a taste of a more refined era.

hotels.title: Heritage Scotland Retreat near Iconic Edinburgh Castle
hotels.description: A contemporary blend of modernity and Victorian heritage, the Hotel Indigo Edinburgh, an IHG Hotel, is ideally positioned in the heart of Edinburgh. Set behind the Georgian facade of five original residential properties, you'll notice small touches throughout the hotel's design paying homage to Edinburgh's history. Enjoy exploring the elegant culture of Scotland's capital, and when you're ready to retreat, the hotel's Turquoise Thistle Bar & Lounge awaits with a selection of speciality whiskies and gins.

hotels.title: Boutique Edinburgh Hotel Minutes from St Andrew Square & Edinburgh Castle
hotels.description: In the heart of New Town, Hotel Indigo Edinburgh - Princes Street, an IHG Hotel, offers a comfortable and contemporary stay ideally situated for shopping and sightseeing. Energise yourself with a visit to the fitness centre, sample a smooth Scottish whiskey at Juniper bar and lounge or explore the upscale boutiques of Princes Street. As evening approaches, spacious and stylish guest rooms beckon, a refined retreat ideal for rest and relaxation after an energetic expedition into Edinburgh.

hotels.title: Top-Rated Five-Star Edinburgh Escape in the West End
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the rich medieval history, enchanting castles and charming pub-lined streets of Edinburgh with a five-star stay at The Roseate Edinburgh, ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. The 19th-century Victorian townhouses make the perfect base for Edinburgh adventures. With 35 contemporary rooms and suites across two buildings, The Roseate Edinburgh showcase the best of neoclassical-inspired glamour, with subtle nods to history. Each of the beautifully appointed spaces features cutting-edge comforts including deep bathtubs in selected rooms, plush sofas and homemade shortbread for a memorable touch. Savour seasonal Scottish produce at the onsite restaurant, have a drink at The Baâ€™ Bar - home to some of the best rare and vintage whiskies in Edinburgh - or try the Garden Bar for a drink surrounded by perfectly manicured grounds. Roam the cobbled alleyways, where there's something to excite travellers of all styles. Explore Old Town for a glimpse of the past, breathe in the fresh air at the top of Arthurs Seat, enjoy a tipple of whisky at the historic pubs or make your way out to portside Leith to unearth boutique shops and top-notch restaurants.

hotels.title: Contemporary Scotland City Break in the Heart of Edinburgh
hotels.description: Explore Edinburgh's ancient delights by day and retire to modern luxury by night at voco Edinburgh - Haymarket, an IHG Hotel. This stylish property is just a short walk from Edinburgh Castle, Princes Street and Princes Street Gardens, but when you're not out and about, stay in to enjoy delicious bites at The Blossom Restaurant & Bar, or work up a sweat at the onsite fitness centre.

hotels.title: Edinburgh Sophisticated Stay near Verdant London Road Gardens
hotels.description: Adjacent to the leafy green London Road Gardens, voco Edinburgh - Royal Terrace, an IHG Hotel, is a sophisticated urban retreat on the edge of Edinburgh's New Town. Invigorate your body at the fitness centre or embark on an expedition to discover vibrant shopping streets, sprawling gardens and impressive monuments within walking distance. Then, sip a Scottish whisky in the Lounge Bar or savour delicious dishes at the Terrace Restaurant while enjoying serene garden views.

hotels.title: Edinburgh Heritage Escape in UNESCO World Heritage-Listed New Town
hotels.description: Explore Edinburgh's UNESCO World Heritage-listed New Town from the Georgian-style Kimpton Charlotte Square Hotel, an IHG Hotel, a renovated heritage escape. Expect polished wooden furnishings, luxury fabrics and eye-popping colours, as well as a magical inner courtyard with a cocktail bar - perfect for an afternoon tipple. Treat yourself to a meal at the acclaimed Middle Eastern restaurant, BABA, before indulging in a pampering treatment at the Spa at Charlotte Square.
